column4: i'm using dapper and how  can connect to a xp machine? i have a switcher and the other machine is connected to that switcher and it also has the internet but i cannot see that machine?
: so is it possible to connect to that machine's shared folders?
on the windows machine you need to get the ip
it will tell you in the network properties in the control panel
on the linux machine, in konqueror go to     smb://<ip>
uh or i guess you use gnome
not sure what it is in gnome sorry
i have no idea what that is
: i know that machine's ip address so then do i have to do anything else?
: when i type smb://ip-address it returns with nothing i mean no folder is shown
hmm, i take it of course that you are sharing folders on the windows machine?
yeah i can see those folders on xp but on ubuntu cannot see them
